entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY FOG
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 70
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS LIKELY, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 90
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY
SHOWERS LIKELY
LOCALLY HEAVY RAINFALL POSSIBLE IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
HUMID WITH HIGHS AROUND 90
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 60
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
